mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_community (board_no, member_no, board_title, board_content, board_written_date, board_category, filename, fileurl) VALUES (board_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #{member_no}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{board_category}, #{filename}, #{fileurl})
mapper.select: SELECT board_no, board_category, board_title ,board_content, board_written_date, board_hit ,board_like, board_dislike, board_report_count, board_blind FROM tb_community WHERE member_no = #{member_no} ORDER BY board_no DESC
